text.text: Welcome to the second edition of Materials and You: Surviving the first day and beyond. Sadly, it looks like some pages were lost!
This book is currently incomplete, but it contains a few test pages for modifiers and tools. Later versions will contain more information, so be sure to check back occasionally!
If you are wondering about the changes in the newest version, check the "What's New" page, linked from GitHub or on the SlimeKnights Discord.
